<script type="text/javascript">
$("#strategyBatContent").click(function(){
	var rel = $(this).attr('rel');
	if(rel == "0"){
		$(this).val('');
		$(this).css('color',"#616161");
		$(this).attr('rel',"1");
	}
})
</script>
